message: This offer aims to provide a substantial share for both players, considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
Aiming to maximize my share, but willing to compromise
I propose a more even distribution of funds, aiming to ensure a fair split while considering the diminishing value of money in future rounds.
Going for a strong finish, but willing to give you a small consolation
I believe a 50/50 split is fair under these circumstances. It ensures both parties receive an equal share, despite the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
